name: Perfect Dark
description:
Step into the Dark...
As Carrington Institute's most promising new Agent, Joanna Dark must uncover the truth behind the dataDyne Corporation's recent technological breakthroughs - breakthroughs which could have serious consequences for mankind.

* Over 40 advanced weapons! Shoot through walls, guide rockets by remote and cloak yourself to slip by unnoticed.
* Highly intelligent Simulants! Command computer-controlled teammates to Attack, Follow, Protect and more!
* Innovative Counter-Op mode! Play as Joanna, while a friend takes control of various enemies.
